all_questions.question: What is the purpose of the subtitler in the system?
all_questions.context: The component that we had to develop for this

all_questions.question: How does the segmenter's decision on punctuation placement affect the machine translation system?
all_questions.context: the segmenter will maybe decide after some more words arrive to put the punctuation at a different place

all_questions.question: What is the concern about updating subtitles in response to changes made by the segmenter or machine translation system?
all_questions.context: that would be very annoying if suddenly something which has been already shown and moved out of the subtitle space of the two lines

all_questions.question: Why is it important to avoid flickering subtitles in the system?
all_questions.context: So that the user will see the subtitles not flickering and what would be very annoying if suddenly something which has been already shown and moved out of the subtitle space

all_questions.question: What is a consequence of having a limited space in the system?
all_questions.context: if you have a limited space then you may be forced to emit some output and update it afterwards
